thread.title: BRIEF-Ht&E Ltd Advises That Australian Taxation Office Has Issued Amended Income Tax Assessments To Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ht&E Ltd Advises That Australian Taxation Office Has Issued Amended Income Tax Assessments To Co

organizations.name: taxation office has issued amended income tax assessments to co

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Ht&E Ltd:
* ADVISES THAT AUSTRALIAN TAXATION OFFICE HAS ISSUED AMENDED INCOME TAX ASSESSMENTS TO CO
* AUSTRALIAN TAXATION OFFICE YET TO DETERMINE WHETHER ANY PENALTIES WILL BE APPLIED
* HT&E INTENDS TO LODGE AN OBJECTION WITH ATO AND IF NECESSARY CONTEST AMENDED ASSESSMENTS THROUGH LITIGATION PROCEEDINGS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
